Reviews.Title: Camera Review
Reviews.Author: ValueShopper "Mrs. T"
Reviews.Content: Camera was on backorder since July 29, 2013.  Seller did stay in contact with us.  He finally cancelled order since he could not get cameras in to fufill order.  He tried to make order right but it just did not work out.  Will try again later but hope he has the correct price listed this time.  Sorry this order did not work out...............

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Abdul Ali "charm"
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect piece for the price. I really love taking panoramic pictures with this camera. Lighting is cool. $150 for 16 MP, this is a steal. No complains.  D'nt try outside yet. But indoor pictures are coming out perfect so for.

Reviews.Title: Returned After One Day
Reviews.Author: Go With Life
Reviews.Content: The Pentax RZ-18, just does not make it.  The first shock is the battery charger is huge, no little plug-in like the Canon system.  Second, camera feels very cheaply made, 95% plastic feel.  But the deal killer is pictures!  When I turn off the flash and just take pictures under the natural light; they all turned out orange!!!!  I pulled out my Canon SD 1300, and there was no comparison.  The Canon sensor grabs the available light and makes interesting pictures, sometimes they are great.  But 100% orange washout by the RZ-18, I was re-packing it for return in 35 minutes.

ProductInfo.Features:
3-inch LCD display
18X optical zoom ( 25-240mm equivalent) with slim foot print
Large and a 4cm super macro mode
Widescreen HD video in 720p @ 30 fps. Face detection for perfect exposure
Pentax sensor shift image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio RZ-18 16 MP Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom - White
